extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.evtx.ParseEvtx
extension.description: Parses the contents of a Windows Event Log file (evtx) and writes the resulting XML to the FlowFile

property.name: granularity
property.description: Output flow file for each Record, Chunk, or File encountered in the event log

relationship.name: success
relationship.description: Any FlowFile that was successfully converted from evtx to XML

relationship.name: failure
relationship.description: Any FlowFile that encountered an exception during conversion will be transferred to this relationship with as much parsing as possible done

relationship.name: original
relationship.description: The unmodified input FlowFile will be transferred to this relationship

relationship.name: bad chunk
relationship.description: Any bad chunks of records will be transferred to this relationship in their original binary form

readsAttribute.name: filename
readsAttribute.description: The filename of the evtx file

writesAttribute.name: mime.type
writesAttribute.description: The output filetype (application/xml for success and failure relationships, original value for bad chunk and original relationships)
